overview: Data Parallel C++ for CUDA is a C++ programming model for accelerators based on the NVIDIA CUDA architecture. It allows users to write C++ code that can be compiled to target NVIDIA GPUs using CUDA for parallel execution.
core_features: Supports C++ programming model for NVIDIA GPUs, enables users to write C++ code for parallel execution on GPUs, allows compilation of C++ code to target CUDA architecture, provides accelerated computing capabilities.
